successes.title: Print on Fabric Using Sunlight: The Lumi Process
successes.description: Analog meets digital with this textile printing process. Our new kits make it easy to do it yourself.

Pledges.description: Show your support! Receive important updates about the Lumi Process.

STARTER KIT - You'll receive one Inkodye starter kit, which includes (3) 4oz dyes, instruction booklet, stencil and tester negative. The basics for Lumi printing. SHIPS FREE IN USA / Add $15 for international shipping

EARLY BIRD - LUMI PRINTING SYSTEM - Help us kickoff this campaign! Print your own images with the Lumi Process. Includes (1) Inkodye Starter Kit, (20) 11x17 copier films, and (1) 16oz bottle of textile detergent.
SHIPS FREE IN USA / Add $20 for international shipping
LUMI PRINTING SYSTEM - Print your own images with the Lumi Process. Includes (1) Inkodye Starter Kit, (20) 11x17 copier films, and (1) 16oz bottle of textile detergent.
SHIPS FREE IN USA / Add $20 for international shipping
SHARE WITH A FRIEND - Friends don't let friends print alone! Includes (2) Inkodye Starter Kits, (20) 11x17 copier films, and (1) 16oz bottle of textile detergent.
SHIPS FREE IN USA / Add $25 for international shipping
TAKE TWO - Two full system kits! Includes (2) Inkodye Starter Kits, (40) 11x17 copier films, and (2) 16oz bottle of textile detergent. SHIPS FREE IN USA / Add $30 for international shipping
